Articles.Content: Anyone able to make a Roadcone aerodynamic part? be super sweeet
Hmm, interesting. I only have one real problem with it: Unless it's unrealistically huge, It wouldn't even be big enough to fit on a .625 node.

> 
> Hmm, interesting. I only have one real problem with it: Unless it's unrealistically huge, It wouldn't even be big enough to fit on a .625 node.

Well RoverDude has updated his Sounding Rockets mod for 1.0 already. 

The pointy end looks a lot like a Road cone only redder.
This appears to be a request for a mod rather than a suggestion for the stock game, and so the thread has been moved to Add-on Affairs.
